betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Pure recursive matter. 
As I explored and experimented, I have encountered many things that exhibited partially-recursive abilities. Gems that can phase in and out of higher dimensions, blood-imbued myrmitite that self-replicates. All of these felt like 'shadows' of something bigger, something more powerful.
While shadows only provide of a single slice of the true nature of something, if enough shadows from enough angles are used, it is possible to get a good idea about the object that originates them.
And so, I was able to make pure recursive matter. 
My first Mythic Fractal!
